dyimagefx.morph

Class Closing

  • java.lang.Object
    • dyimagefx.morph.Closing

  • public class Closing
extends java.lang.Object
    File: Closing.java Description: Implements the image morphology operation: closing. CLosing is defined as dilation followed by erosion of image. WHITE is represented as (255,255,255,255) and BLACK as (255,0,0,0) in ARGB form respectively.

      • binaryImage

        public static void binaryImage(MyImage img)

        Parameters:

      • grayscaleImage

        public static void grayscaleImage(MyImage img,
                  int[] mask,
                  int maskSize)
        This method will perform closing on grayscale image img.
        Parameters:
        img - The image on which opening is performed.
        mask - The square mask
        maskSize - The size of the square mask [No. of rows or columns of the square mask]
